author: Special Correspondent
text:
Unknown persons hurled a country bomb on Tamilarasan, an office bearer of a communal outfit, at Kattur on the city’s outskirts on Sunday.

There was no injury to any one in the attack.

Police sources said Tamilarasan, against whom several cases had been registered, was travelling in a car after attending a wedding near Vayalur.

Car damaged

As the car neared Kattur, three persons lobbed a country bomb on the car which got damaged in the attack.

Based on a complaint from Tamilarasan, the Tiruverumbur police have registered a case.

Investigation was on, the sources said.
title: Bomb hurled on caste outfit member
